pages.text:
Our Story
Introducing Riverside Johnny's, a vibrant eatery located in beautiful Daytona Beach. A modern twist on the classic bar and grill, this fun and casual restaurant offers a relaxed atmosphere to enjoy great food and drinks. Whether you're looking to catch up with friends, bask in the sun while watching your favorite sports team on one of our many big screen TVs or simply have a memorable dining experience, Riverside Johnny's has got you covered. So come visit us today and discover the laid back vibe of this must visit riverside destination.
Get ready for an unforgettable dining experience at Riverside Johnny's, Daytona Beach's newest hotspot!
